meanings.definition: A large, brightly colored bird native to Central and South America.
meanings.sent1: The guans flew gracefully through the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of guans perched on a tree branch.
meanings.sent3: The guans decided to have a colorful feather fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as vibrant as a flock of guans.
meanings.sent5: The guans' plumage was a dazzling display of colors.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Guatemala.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for guans at the bank.
meanings.sent2: The price of the souvenir was ten guans.
meanings.sent3: In Guatemala, you can buy delicious food with guans.
meanings.sent4: His savings were like a pile of guans waiting to be spent.
meanings.sent5: The guans in his wallet jingled as he walked.

meanings.definition: A type of fruit tree found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The guans in the orchard were heavy with ripe fruits.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sweet taste of guans from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkeys loved to steal guans from the branches.
meanings.sent4: The guans swayed gently in the breeze, offering their fruits.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the guans filled the air with tropical sweetness.
